subtitle: A rice dish made from smoked fish and cheese.

method.text: Put the fish in a pan. Cover with water and gently poach for 12 min or until the flesh flakes easily.
Remove and break into large flakes, discarding any skin and bones. Chop the eggs.

Melt the butter in a large pan and add the fish, chopped eggs, rice, peas and cream. Mix gently and cook on a low heat, stirring continuously, until heated. Just before serving, stir in the herbs and the cheese. Season.

title: Caerphilly cheese kedgeree
